snippet: United States women's national team coach Pia Sundhage has called in 29 players for a nine-day training camp to prepare for the Olympic qualifying tournament in Canada this month.
abstract: United States women's national team coach Pia Sundhage has called in 29 players for a nine-day training camp to prepare for the Olympic qualifying tournament in Canada this month.

headline.main: Sundhage Calls in 29 for Pre-Olympic Camp
